positive_examples: This is an example of superconductor.
We observed superconductor in this context.
A typical case of superconductor would involve these features.
The concept of superconductor applies here.
A substance that exhibits zero electrical resistance and expels magnetic fields when cooled below a critical temperature.
negative_examples: This is an example of electrolyte, not superconductor.
This represents conductor substance in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Electrolyte, or other types of ConductorSubstance

definition: A material that conducts electricity with zero resistance below a critical temperature.
